```{r, include = FALSE}
library(mosaic)
options(digits = 6)
library(Stat2Data)
library(GGally)
library(readr)
library(ggformula)
```

#### Read in SLD

```{r}
SLD <- read_csv("data/SLD.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
View(SLD)
```


```{r}
colnames(SLD)
Ranking_SLD <- subset(SLD, select = c(NatWalkInd, D2A_Ranked, D2B_Ranked, D3B_Ranked, D4A_Ranked))

favstats (~NatWalkInd, data =SLD )
```


```{r}
gf_dhistogram (~NatWalkInd, data =SLD, bins=10 )%>%
  gf_density()
```


```{r}
modSLD <- subset(SLD, select = c(NatWalkInd, AutoOwn0, Pct_AO0, AutoOwn1, Pct_AO1))
ggpairs(modSLD)
```

```{r}
NewYork_SanFrancisco_data <- SLD %>%
  filter(CSA_Name == "New York-Newark, NY-NJ-CT-PA" | CSA_Name == "San Jose-San Francisco-Oakland, CA")

write.csv(NewYork_SanFrancisco_data, "C:/Users/llync/Documents/GitHub/STAT230-FinalGroupProject/data/NewYork_SanFrancisco_data.csv")
```
